model_hint: Use face/style reference with strength ~0.85 to preserve messy hair, headphones, and eye-bags

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Japanese technical college student Goda Takeshi, same character as reference, face/headshot, short messy black hair with clear bedhead, half-open sleepy brown eyes, noticeable dark under-eye circles, casual gaming T-shirt visible at frame edge, over-ear gaming headphones worn, slightly slouched sleepy expression, dusky complexion from late-night gaming, high-detail anime/cel-shaded illustration, keep identity with reference image, focus on face
expressions.negative_prompt: neat hair, formal clothing, exaggerated smile, glowing magical effects, colorful accessories, no headphones, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry, lowres

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, short messy hair, half-lidded brown eyes with playful light, small confident smirk, slight tilt of head, headphones visible, casual gaming tee, faint cheek lines to emphasize smirk, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity via hair and headphones
expressions.negative_prompt: wide grin, manic expression, neat hair, formal attire, exaggerated blush, tears, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 興奮（ゲームで盛り上がり）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, messy black hair, eyes wide and bright, energetic grin showing teeth slightly, small sweat drop of excitement optional, headphones on, warm highlight in eyes, casual gamer vibe, high-detail anime style, keep identity consistent
expressions.negative_prompt: overly cute, sparkles excessive, formal clothes, tear streaming, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, messy hair, narrow intense eyes, furrowed brow, pursed lips, headphones snug, faint shadow on brow to show concentration, pencil of light on face from screen, casual shirt visible, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity
expressions.negative_prompt: sleepy eyes, smiling, cheerful, bright cheerful background, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, messy hair slightly covering forehead, averted gaze, slight blush on cheeks, awkward half-smile or sheepish mouth, hand near back of neck suggested in lower frame, headphones still worn, anime illustration with subtle emotional shift, keep identity
expressions.negative_prompt: exaggerated blush, wide eyes panic, tears, cute pose, formal clothes, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, messy hair, eyes wide open, mouth slightly open in surprise, eyebrows raised, headphones slightly askew, dynamic lighting hit from side, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity via hair and accessories
expressions.negative_prompt: calm, sleepy, grin, formal clothes, text, watermark, mutation, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 苛立ち（負けた時の怒り）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, messy hair, furrowed brow, scowl, gritted teeth or tight mouth, slight flush of anger on cheeks, headphones visible, intense anime expression, keep identity consistent
expressions.negative_prompt: laughing, smiling, cute blush, formal clothes, exaggerated cartoonish steam, text, watermark, bad anatomy, blurry

expressions.expression_label: 居眠り（リラックス/寝落ち）
expressions.positive_prompt: Close-up portrait, Goda Takeshi same character as reference, face/headshot, messy hair slightly more relaxed, eyes closed peacefully, mouth relaxed, headphones slightly crooked, gentle soft lighting indicating rest, subtle droop of head, anime/cel-shaded, preserve identity and avoid exaggerated drooling
expressions.negative_prompt: open eyes, bright active expression, wide smile, formal clothes, text, watermark, cartoon snoring bubbles, bad anatomy, blurry

workflow_recommendation.step1: Upload 02_Characters/images/Takeshi/Takeshi1.png to NanoBananaPro as reference (Face ID / Character Ref enabled)
workflow_recommendation.step2: Set reference_strength to ~0.85 to lock identity (bedhead, headphones, under-eye bags)
workflow_recommendation.step3: Generate each expression with corresponding positive_prompt and negative_prompt; use 1:1 crop focusing on face
workflow_recommendation.step4: Adjust denoising_strength per expression for subtle vs. drastic changes (0.30-0.50)
workflow_recommendation.step5: Save outputs with suggested filenames: Takeshi_Neutral.png, Takeshi_Smirk.png, Takeshi_Excited.png, etc.
